Lodi.Olde Lockeford Winery: Olde Lockeford Winery is a winery and custom crush facility in Lockeford, California, United States. The winery was founded in 1946 as the Lockeford Cooperative Winery, but had closed more than a decade before being purchased by Don Litchfield in 1998. The winery complex was renamed Vino Piazza, and reconfigured to house multiple "micro-wineries".
